title: Lloyd Harding - 100s of Knife Patterns - KnifemakerC
description:
Lloyd Harding

This is a tribute to Lloyd Harding, Western Australian Master knife maker, 
1921 to 2003. 

It is intended to give inspiration and practical assistance to new and established makers. 


104 templates and 300 drawings have been scanned to scale to allow them to be printed as templates. 


All are free to copy provided the due credit is given to Lloyd Harding and distributed free of charge to assist the art of knife making and provide a remembrance of a true craftsman and gentleman. 

Not for sale or profit.   
 <a href="
http://www.hurleyknives.com/lloyd.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
